alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 10:00PM MST until December 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Upper Weiser River zone. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
